headline: Strong EPS Forecasts and Analyst Optimism Might Change the Case for Investing in Rollins (ROL)
summary: Rollins recently attracted attention as analysts forecast a 13.8% year-over-year increase in adjusted EPS for its fiscal Q3 2025 results, reflecting robust operational performance and growing demand for its pest control services. JPMorgan initiated coverage with an Overweight rating and highlighted Rollins' recurring service contracts, margin improvements, and adoption of AI as important contributors to its positive industry positioning. With analysts projecting strong earnings growth, we'll...
